channel.title: Direct to VHS! May: you mecha my heart bleed
channel.description:
Direct to VHS!
A weekly sunday one-shot with a cinematic lens. You can sign up for all or only one game. Each month a clerk at the Gauntlet city video store showcases films they enjoy. We play those films out as games.
May: You Mecha my heart bleed
Clerk: Sofia, a mecha anime enthusiast, says she’s just received a shipment of surplus movies from a little known mecha art film collective and she’s super excited to show you what she’s found. She warns you, they all end tragically.
1. Mobile Frame Zero: Firebrands
“Black Rose Calypso” A rebellious space epic. Romance, war, railguns and meaningful glances.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4_fDrchMZwRBfk3tLF [date=2020-05-03 time=09:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] 2. Dusk to Midnight
“Our Better Angels” A sad film about a doomed group of mecha pilots
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4_g77oa9DH_l0IJEOu [date=2020-05-10 time=09:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] 3. Echo
“Silicon” A film about a war torn planet and its children
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4_h-il198ly2rZkWee [date=2020-05-17 time=09:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] 4. Together We
“Four Part Harmony” A crew runs a single ultra mech against a terrifying foe.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4_hmyuiFwmXFFR_ebD [date=2020-05-24 time=09:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] 5. Rider’s Last Rites
“We bury you in starlight” A memorial for a fallen mecha pilot.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4_ihnW3McVQIQ4n2Vr [date=2020-05-31 time=09:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"]
